paragraphs.experience: For over 5 years, I've been supporting companies in their digital transformation by creating custom solutions that combine aesthetics and performance.
paragraphs.approach: My approach focuses on three pillars:
paragraphs.services: Whether for a Shopify store, a WordPress site or a SaaS application, I make sure that every pixel and every line of code serves your vision.

1.title: Luxury E-Commerce
1.description: High-end store with premium shopping experience

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: The client wanted to migrate their old store to Shopify while maintaining a premium identity and drastically improving user experience and conversions.
points: Creating a premium experience on mobile and desktop
Integration of a product customization system
Implementation of loyalty and recommendation system

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: I developed a custom Shopify theme with advanced features, focusing on performance and premium user experience.

approach.title: Shopify Plus Architecture
approach.description: Using Shopify Plus with custom theme in Liquid and vanilla JavaScript for optimal performance. Implementation of custom Apps for specific needs.

approach.title: Premium Design System
approach.description: Creation of a cohesive design system with subtle animations, elegant typography and airy layout to reflect the brand's high-end positioning.

approach.title: Product Customization
approach.description: Development of an interactive product configurator allowing customers to customize their purchases in real-time with 3D preview.

approach.title: Performance Optimization
approach.description: Lazy loading of images, automatic compression, optimized Shopify CDN, and minified code to ensure ultra-fast loading even on mobile.

metrics.label: Conversion
metrics.description: Increase in conversion rate in 3 months

testimonial.quote: Florent transformed our vision into an exceptional online store. Sales have exploded and our customers love the new experience.
testimonial.author: Marie Dubois

2.title: Corporate Website
2.description: Elegant showcase website for law firm

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Create a professional website reflecting the firm's expertise and prestige while facilitating contact and service discovery.
points: Complete overhaul of the firm's digital identity
Clear presentation of 15+ areas of expertise

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: Development of a custom WordPress theme with ACF Pro for maximum flexibility and flawless user experience.

approach.title: Custom WordPress Theme
approach.description: Creation of a custom theme with modular architecture, allowing complete page customization via Advanced Custom Fields.

approach.title: Multilingual System
approach.description: Integration of WPML for professional management of 3 languages with content translation and cultural adaptation.

approach.title: Appointment Booking
approach.description: Development of a booking system connected to the firm's calendar with automatic email notifications.

approach.title: Security & Performance
approach.description: Implementation of SSL certificates, WAF firewall, image optimization and caching for a PageSpeed score of 95/100.

testimonial.quote: A website that perfectly reflects our professionalism. Our clients regularly compliment us on the ease of navigation and modern aesthetics.
testimonial.author: Attorney Jean Dupont

3.title: Task Management SaaS
3.description: Project management application with analytics dashboard

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Develop a complete SaaS project management application capable of competing with market leaders while offering a superior user experience.
points: Intuitive interface with no learning curve

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: Building a modern Next.js stack with PostgreSQL database and Vercel deployment for optimal performance.

approach.title: Full Stack Architecture
approach.description: Using Next.js 14 with App Router, React Server Components, and API Routes. PostgreSQL database via Prisma ORM for reliability and performance.

approach.title: Real-Time & Collaboration
approach.description: Integration of WebSockets for real-time synchronization of changes and user presence. Granular permissions system.

approach.title: Analytics Dashboard
approach.description: Development of interactive data visualizations with Chart.js and real-time statistics on project progress.

approach.title: Performance & Scalability
approach.description: Server-side optimizations with React Server Components, strategic caching, and edge deployment for response times < 100ms.

testimonial.quote: The application exceeds our expectations. Our users love the fluidity and power of the features. The best technical investment we've made.
testimonial.author: Thomas Martin

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Launch an online store for a new fashion brand with a limited budget but rapid growth ambitions.
points: Modern and trendy design that stands out
Mobile-first experience for Gen Z audience

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: Development of a Shopify Plus store with headless React frontend for maximum flexibility and exceptional performance.

approach.title: Headless Shopify
approach.description: Using Shopify Storefront API with custom React frontend for total control over design and animations.

approach.title: Dynamic Collections
approach.description: Automated collection management system with tags and metafields, allowing quick updates without technical intervention.

approach.title: Social Commerce
approach.description: Complete integration of Instagram Shopping, TikTok Shop, and direct purchase buttons from social networks.

approach.title: Drops & Pre-orders
approach.description: Development of a countdown and pre-order system with email and SMS notifications to create urgency.

testimonial.quote: Florent understood our vision and exceeded it. Our store has become a real growth tool for our brand.
testimonial.author: Sophie Laurent

5.title: Restaurant Website
5.description: Website with online booking and interactive menu

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Create an online presence worthy of a starred restaurant with integrated booking system and interactive digital menu.
points: Elegant design reflecting the restaurant's atmosphere
Table booking system with table management
Integration of allergens and special diets

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: Custom WordPress site with WooCommerce adapted for bookings and an interactive digital menu developed in JavaScript.

approach.title: Gourmet Design
approach.description: Creation of a clean and elegant design with large typography, full-screen images and subtle animations reflecting the restaurant's standing.

approach.title: Interactive Menu
approach.description: Development of a digital menu with filters by allergens, diets, and categories. High-quality photos and detailed descriptions.

approach.title: Smart Reservations
approach.description: Adaptation of WooCommerce Bookings to manage table reservations with time slot selection, number of guests and special requests.

approach.title: Performance & SEO
approach.description: Optimization of heavy images, lazy loading, and local SEO to appear first in local Google searches.

testimonial.quote: The site revolutionized our management. No more phone calls for reservations, and our customers love discovering the menu online before coming.
testimonial.author: Chef Pierre Mercier

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Develop a custom CRM adapted to the specific needs of French SMEs, simpler and more affordable than existing solutions.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: Modern web application built with React and Node.js, deployed on AWS with microservices architecture for scalability.

approach.title: Modern MERN Stack
approach.description: React frontend with Redux for state management, Node.js/Express backend, and MongoDB database for client data flexibility.

approach.title: Visual Pipeline
approach.description: Kanban drag-and-drop interface to visualize and manage sales pipeline with customizable statuses and automations.

approach.title: Automations
approach.description: No-code automation system allowing creation of custom workflows (automatic emails, reminders, tasks).

approach.title: Integrations
approach.description: Connections with Gmail, Outlook, Google Calendar, Zapier, and webhooks to integrate with existing business ecosystems.

testimonial.quote: Finally a CRM designed for SMEs! Simple, effective, and the support is excellent. We've saved so much time in our sales management.
testimonial.author: Marc Durand
